testcase.name: It can aggregate the RS Splits of it's ServiceDeliveryProfiles
It can check if the RS Splits are valid
It can check if the SS Splits are valid
It can aggregate the RS Split Percents of it's ServiceDeliveryProfiles
It can aggregate pending charges and credits
We can get the ServiceContractLineItems that don't yet belong to an invoice
It can determine if it has pending on-demand line items
It can determine if it has pending recurring line items
It can determine if it has pending charges/credits
It can determine that it is for regular service
We can check that a Service Contract has at least one Service Delivery Profile for it's Regular Service
